name: Yellow Farmer Shirt
description:
## Yellow Farmer Shirt

The colour of happiness, warmth and sunflowers! A beloved shirt amongst all farmers.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
